settings.title: Debug PHP
settings.description: Shows PHP and Database debug information at the bottom of the page.
settings.name: debug_enable

settings.title: Debug Themes
settings.description: Shows the theme output of each theme labeled with the theme filepath as well as the controller filename and function is used to process the output.
settings.name: debug_theme_enable

settings.title: Debug IP
settings.description: Limits debug output to this IP address only.
settings.name: debug_ipaddress

settings.title: Disable Overrides
settings.description: Ignore all files in the overrides folder. The Debug IP setting above has no effect over this setting which runs for all site visitors.
settings.name: debug_overrides_disable

settings.title: Disable DB Query Index Hints
settings.description: By specifying index hints in certain DB queries it is possible to improve their performance. In some setups the index hints have a counter effect and disabling the feature allows MySQL to find a better index.
settings.name: db_index_hints_disable

settings.title: Include language segment in Ajax URI
settings.description: Setting only relevant for multilingual sites. Disable if ajax requests fail on non-default languages.
settings.name: ajaxuri_lang_segment

settings.title: Load Combined/Minified CSS
settings.description: Speed up loading times by loading a single minified CSS file. 3rd party and add-on stylesheets load separately.
settings.name: libraries_css_minified

settings.title: Load Combined/Minified Scripts
settings.description: Speed up loading times by loading a single minified script file. 3rd party and add-on scripts load separately.
settings.name: libraries_scripts_minified

settings.title: Enable Javascript Loader
settings.description: Loads scripts in parallel and non-blocking to speed up the page rendering process.
settings.name: libraries_scripts_loader

settings.title: Disable jQuery
settings.description: NOT optional. If you disable it, make sure it is loaded by your template or a plugin.
settings.name: libraries_jquery

settings.title: Disable jQuery UI
settings.description: NOT optional. If you disable it, make sure it is loaded by your template or a plugin.
settings.name: libraries_jqueryui

settings.title: Page title separator
settings.description: Modify the page title separator used between the site name and the current page title
settings.name: page_title_separator

settings.title: Site name position
settings.description: Change the position of the site name, relative to the page title
settings.name: site_name_position

settings.title: Disable Secure URLs when site accessed via SSL
settings.description: Useful for add-ons that render site links on remote sites with secure URLs. This only works for URLs rendered by JReviews.
settings.name: url_no_ssl

settings.title: Create accounts for guests
settings.description: Guests will be given the option to enter a username when making a submission to automatically create an account for them. This feature requires that email activation in Joomla is enabled so users can receive an email with a temporary password.
settings.name: user_registration_guest

settings.title: Use username or realname
settings.description: Guests will be given the option to enter a username when making a submission to automatically create an account for them. This feature requires that email activation in Joomla is enabled so users can receive an email with a temporary password.
settings.name: name_choice

settings.title: Enable reCAPTCHA for spam reduction
settings.description: Used in listing, review, discussion and inquiry forms.
settings.name: security_image

settings.title: Site theme
settings.description: Choose the Theme to use for the JReviews frontend.
settings.name: template

settings.title: Mobile theme
settings.description: If a mobile device is detected the selected theme will be used instead of the Site Theme.
settings.name: mobile_theme

settings.title: Fallback theme
settings.description: Choose a theme with a complete set of files to use as fallback if the selected theme doesn't include all theme files.
settings.name: fallback_theme

settings.title: Version override for custom_styles.css
settings.description: If you use a custom_styles.css file in your theme you can force a change in the version parameter through this setting to force browsers to load the new file on their next visit to the site.
settings.name: custom_styles_version

settings.title: Enable Ajax pagination'
settings.description: Improves the user experience by loading pages in paginated lists without page reloads.
settings.name: paginator_ajax

settings.title: Number of items per page
settings.description: Used for pagination.
settings.name: list_limit

settings.title: Number of pages shown in pagination in lists
settings.description: Number of pages between the first and last page.
settings.name: paginator_mid_range

settings.title: Display 'Results per page'
settings.description: Dropdown list shown in list pages in the front-end. Disabled by default to avoid duplicate pages for SEO.
settings.name: display_list_limit

settings.title: Show Breadcrumb
settings.description: Adds a pathway on top of JReviews' category and detail pages.
settings.name: dir_show_breadcrumb

settings.title: Override breadcrumb in detail page
settings.description: Takes over the article page breadcrumb showing JReviews links.
settings.name: breadcrumb_detail_override

settings.title: Cron Secret
settings.description: This will be the secret key used to call the cron url to prevent abuse.
settings.name: cron_secret

settings.title: Run Cron on site visits
settings.description: If you disable this setting you should setup a cron job on your server to be run at specified intervals. It is recommended you do this for large sites where cron jobs may take longer to complete.
settings.name: cron_site_visits

settings.title: Recalculate ratings
settings.description: Cron interval to re-calculate the bayesian ratings average.
settings.name: ratings_rebuild_interval

settings.title: Rebuild reviewer rank
settings.description: Cron interval to re-calculate the reviewer ranks.
settings.name: ranks_rebuild_interval

settings.title: Rebuild media likes rank
settings.description: Cron interval to re-calculate the media likes rank.
settings.name: media_likes_rebuild_interval

settings.title: Purge cache interval
settings.description: Cron interval to purge the entire cache contents.
settings.name: cache_cleanup

settings.title: Community Integration
settings.keywords: community, jomsocial, easysocial, builder, buddypress, profiles
settings.description: JReviews will automatically show user avatars and create links to user profiles from listings and reviews.
settings.name: community

settings.title: Social Sharing
settings.keywords: social, sharing, twitter, facbeook, google, linkedin, pinterest, reddit
settings.description: Select the social sharing buttons you want to display in detail pages.
settings.name: social_sharing_detail

settings.title: Activty Stream Integration
settings.description: Configure which activities should be displayed in the stream.
settings.name: jomsocial_tnmode

settings.title: Twitter Integration
settings.keywords: community, twitter, tweet, application, app, bit.ly, bitly, api, hashtag
settings.description: Setup Twitter integration and select which activities to auto Tweet to the site account.
settings.name: twitter_enable

settings.title: Facebook Integration
settings.keywords: community, facebook, fb, application, app, post, page, open graph protocol
settings.description: Setup Facebook integration and select which activities to post to the submitters stream.
settings.name: facebook_appid

settings.title: Show alphabetical index bar
settings.description: Display A-Z letters in directory page for quick index searches
settings.name: dir_show_alphaindex

settings.title: Display category images
settings.description: Display the top level category images in the directory page
settings.name: dir_cat_images

settings.title: Number of columns
settings.description: Number of columnns to use for top level categories in directory page.
settings.name: dir_columns

settings.title: Show number of entries per category
settings.description: Show listing count for categories in directory and category pages.
settings.name: dir_cat_num_entries

settings.title: Hide empty categories
settings.description: Hide category links without listings in directory and category pages.
settings.name: dir_category_hide_empty

settings.title: Category levels to show
settings.description: Set the number of sub-category levels to show in the directory  page.
settings.name: dir_category_levels

settings.title: Categories format
settings.description: Set the layout for sub-categories to bullets or comma list in the directory page.
settings.name: dir_cat_format

settings.title: Pre-defined layout
settings.keywords: theme, list, layout, blogview, thumbview, tableview, masonry
settings.description: Choose between tableview, blogview, thumbview and masonry.
settings.name: list_predefined_layout

settings.title: Show category header image
settings.description: Show the category image in the header of the category page.
settings.name: list_show_page_catimage

settings.title: Show 'Add new listing' button in category pages
settings.name: list_show_addnew

settings.title: Use current page Itemid in the 'Add new listing' url
settings.name: list_addnew_menuid

settings.title: Show listings of child categories
settings.description: Display listings of subcategories in parent category page.
settings.name: list_show_child_listings

settings.title: Slider listing columns
settings.description: Defines the number of listings that the user can see at once in the comparison page.
settings.name: list_compare_columns

settings.title: Show detailed user ratings
settings.description: If enabled the individual criteria ratings will be shown in the comparison page.
settings.name: list_compare_user_ratings

settings.title: Show detailed editor ratings
settings.description: If enabled the individual criteria ratings will be shown in the comparison page.
settings.name: list_compare_editor_ratings

settings.title: Show sub-category links in category page
settings.name: list_show_categories

settings.title: Number of columns for categories
settings.description: Sets the number of columns for the sub-category links in the category page.
settings.name: cat_columns

settings.title: Show category images
settings.description: Display sub-category images in the category page
settings.name: list_show_catimages

settings.title: Show ordering dropdown list
settings.description: Display sorting list in category page.
settings.name: list_show_orderselect

settings.title: Default Ordering
settings.description: Set the default ordering for category and search result pages.
settings.name: list_order_default

settings.title: Ordering options
settings.description: Choose the ordering options to include in the sorting list in category and search result pages.
settings.name: list_order_options

settings.title: Include rating criteria
settings.description: Set whether to include rating criteria options in the sorting list in category and search result pages.
settings.name: list_order_criteria

settings.title: Order by field
settings.description: Use a custom field as the default ordering.
settings.name: list_order_field

settings.title: Listing Date
settings.description: Show the listing created date
settings.name: list_show_date

settings.title: Listing Author
settings.description: Show the listing author
settings.name: list_show_author

settings.title: Listing Average User Rating
settings.description: Show the listing average user rating in listing list pages.
settings.name: list_show_user_rating

settings.title: Listing Average Editor Rating
settings.description: Show the listing average editor rating in listing list pages.
settings.name: list_show_editor_rating

settings.title: Listing Views
settings.description: Show the listing views.
settings.name: list_show_hits

settings.title: Show summary
settings.description: Show the summary in listing list pages.
settings.name: list_show_abstract

settings.title: Trim summary (words)
settings.description: Limit the number of words shown in the summary in listing list pages.
settings.name: list_abstract_trim

settings.title: Show 'New' Label
settings.description: Show the label for recently submitted listings
settings.name: list_abstract_trim

settings.title: 'New' label days
settings.description: Set the threshold used to display the label listings.
settings.name: list_new_days

settings.title: Show 'Hot' Label
settings.description: Show the label for most viewed listings
settings.name: list_hot

settings.title: 'Hot' number of views
settings.description: Set the threshold used to display the label listings.
settings.name: list_hot_hits

settings.title: Show 'Featured' Label
settings.description: Show the label for featured listings
settings.name: list_featured

settings.title: Show 'read more' link
settings.description: Show the read more link in list pages
settings.name: list_show_readmore

settings.title: Show 'read reviews' link
settings.description: Show the read reviews link in list pages
settings.name: list_show_readreviews

settings.title: Show 'write review' link
settings.description: Show the write review link in list pages
settings.name: list_show_newreview

settings.title: Enable 'cover' selection
settings.description: Allows users to select a photo as the cover for the listing detail header.
settings.name: media_photo_function_cover

settings.title: Enable 'logo' selection
settings.description: Allows users to select a photo as the logo for the listing detail header.
settings.name: media_photo_function_logo

settings.title: Show empty 'cover'
settings.description: Displays the cover area in the listing detail header even when a cover has not been set.
settings.name: listing_detail_header_empty_cover

settings.title: Empty cover background color
settings.description: Set the default background color for the empty cover in the listing detail header.
settings.name: listing_detail_header_empty_cover_color

settings.title: Show empty 'logo'
settings.description: Displays the logo area in the listing detail header even when a logo has not been set.
settings.name: listing_detail_header_empty_logo

settings.title: Empty logo background color
settings.description: Set the default background color for the empty logo in the listing detail header.
settings.name: listing_detail_header_empty_logo_color

settings.title: Display avatar in header
settings.description: If available, show the listing owner avatar in the logo position in the listing detail header when a log has not been set.
settings.name: listing_detail_header_avatar

settings.title: Enable claims only for listings owned by
settings.name: claims_enable_userids

settings.title: Limit the number of characters shown
settings.description: Add a read more link in the listing detail page that expands to display the complete summary and description.
settings.name: summary_desc_char_limit

settings.title: Enable Listing Inquiries
settings.keywords: enquiry, inquiry, inquiries, contact, email, e-mail
settings.description: Site visitors can fill a contact form in the listing detail page to request information.

settings.title: Inquiry is sent to
settings.keywords: enquiry, inquiry, inquiries, contact, email, e-mail
settings.description: Set the recipient for inquiries: listing owner, site e-mail or custom field email.

settings.description: Set the custom field name to be used as the recipient for listing inquiries.

settings.description: Set a BCC e-mail that will be sent a copy of listing inquiries.

settings.title: View All Reviews Canonical (SEO)

settings.title: Rating selector
settings.description: Choose between a select list or start icons.
settings.name: rating_selector

settings.title: User rating style
settings.description: User rating style used in listings and review form
settings.name: user_rating_style

settings.title: Editor rating style
settings.description: Editor rating style used in listings and review form

settings.title: User rating color
settings.description: User rating color

settings.title: Rating selector
settings.description: Choose between a select list or start icons.

settings.title: Rating selector (mobile)

settings.title: Pre-select N/A for optional rating criteria

settings.description: Between 0 and 1, where 0 is the equivalent of disabling the Bayesian Average.

settings.title: Enable Bayesian average for editor reviews
settings.name: editor_review_bayesian

settings.title: Editor reviews tuning parameter

settings.title: Cache Expiration
settings.description: Cached files will be re-created if they have expired.
settings.name: cache_expires

settings.title: Enable query cache
settings.description: Reduces the number of queries per page. The cache is cleared after the cache duration has passed or everytime the JReviews setup, configuration, a listing or review is submitted or updated.
settings.name: cache_query

settings.title: Enable session cache
settings.description: Caches data to the user's session to reduce the number of queries. For example the total count of results for different paginated pages is cached and then read from the user's session data.
settings.name: cache_session
